name: Chat Guess Games
description:
Chat Guess Games is a community game for Twitch Streamers. A game for your community to battle it out and see who truly knows the most about video games!

Screenshots, artwork, genres, release year and more are displayed on screen and chat races to guess the correct game first!

  • Rounds can be started with chat commands, from within the game, or users can use their channel points to redeem a round.
  • Autoplay mode where the rounds keep coming, perfect for engaging viewers during breaks.
  • Channel Leaderboards to encourage competition in your community and Global Leaderboards to compete against other channels and see which community is best at game trivia.
